required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Intake of Hydrolyzed Krill Protein Isolate on Plasma Amino Acid Profile
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Intake of Hydrolyzed Krill Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Isolate and Soy Protein Isolate on Plasma Amino Acid Profile

brief_summary.textblock: Purpose: To examine the absorption of three different protein sources: hydrolyzed krill protein isolate, whey protein isolate, and soy protein isolate.

detailed_description.textblock: Design and Method: Randomized, controlled, double-blind cross-study, in which 12 healthy adult young men in randomized order ingest 35 g of protein of crude protein from one of the three protein sources or water on four different experimental days. Before and up to three hours after ingestion of the test beverage, blood samples are collected for 8 time points during each experimental day.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Design and Method: Randomized, controlled, double-blind cross-study, in which 12 healthy adult young men in randomized order ingest 35 g of protein of crude protein from one of the three protein sources or water on four different experimental days. Before and up to three hours after ingestion of the test beverage, blood samples are collected for 8 time points during each experimental day.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes prior to supplement up to 180 minutes after supplement
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of changes in amino acids concentrations in the blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes prior to supplement up to 180 minutes after supplement
secondary_outcome.description: Measurements of changes in Hunger and satiety using 100 mm Visual Analogue Scores

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes prior to supplement up to 180 minutes after supplement

intervention.description: Ingestion of 35 g Krill protein hydrolysate
Ingestion of 35 g Soy protein isolate
Ingestion of 35 g Whey protein isolate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- men
- 18-30 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- smoking,
- medication,
- health issues conflicting with the experimental trial

facility.name: Aarhus University, Department for Public Health, Section for Sport Science

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be available by contacting the corresponding author up to five years after publication. However, before reuse an acceptance from the participants for reuse is mandatory.
